definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Foul and festering are my sores because of my folly.
sentences.chinese: 我的创痍溃烂流脓，完全由于我的愚蒙。

sentences.english: In severe cases, the skin can crack and weep.
sentences.chinese: 在恶劣的条件下，皮肤可能会开裂并流脓。

sentences.english: My wounds stink and are corrupt because of my foolishness.
sentences.chinese: 因我的愚昧，我的伤发臭流脓。

sentences.english: The main symptom was prsented as nasal obstruction pus snot and nosebleed.
sentences.chinese: 临床常以鼻塞流脓涕及鼻衄为主要症状。

sentences.english: My wounds fester and are loathsome because of my sinful folly.
sentences.chinese: 因我的愚昧，我的伤发臭流脓。

sentences.english: The wound had not healed properly and was oozing pus.
sentences.chinese: 伤口未真正痊愈，还在流脓。

sentences.english: Acute period is main and clinical the symptom is urethral suppurate and urethral ache.
sentences.chinese: 急性期主要临床症状是尿道流脓和尿道疼痛。

sentences.english: The medicine can prevent the wound from festering.

definition: (of a sore etc) to fester/to ulcerate
